sentences.sContent: I was delirious and blacked out several times.
sentences.sCn: 我当时神志不清，几次昏过去。

synos.tran: 发狂的；神志昏迷的；精神错乱的

words.tran: 谵妄地；神志失常地；极其兴奋地
精神错乱；发狂，狂热；说谵语状态

trans.tranCn: 神志昏迷的, 不省人事的, 发狂的
trans.tranOther: Someone who is delirious is unable to think or speak in a sensible and reasonable way, usually because they are very ill and have a fever
